author: John Kruzel
statement: Says Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein announced in February that "the Russia collusion investigation is over."

author: Miriam Valverde
statement: In 2017, ICE "arrested more than 127,000 illegal immigrants with criminal convictions or facing charges of breaking our nation's’ laws," and removed nearly 5,000 gang members.

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: "In Wisconsin, abortion is still a crime."

author: Chris Nichols
statement: Says Congressman Tom McClintock, R-Calif., "has authored three laws since he’s been in office; two renamed post offices."

author: Bill McCarthy
statement: "In December of 2017, the Prince William board of supervisors had a meeting ... (Corey Stewart) skipped that meeting to go campaign in Alabama for Roy Moore to be a U.S. senator … You haven't disavowed Roy Moore's name yet."

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: Says Joe Manchin said "yes to repealing Obamacare. He lied."

author: John Kruzel
statement: Says FBI agent Peter Strzok’s hearing confirmed Republican Congressman Jim Jordan’s theory about how the Justice Department got the Steele dossier.

author: Amy Sherman
statement: "Richard Cordray wants to raise your taxes by reversing President Trump's tax reform."

author: Jon Greenberg
statement: "The price of soybeans has fallen 50% since 5 years before the election. A big reason is bad (terrible) trade deals with other countries."

author: Bill McCarthy
statement: "Republicans vote to make it legal nationwide to ban gays and lesbians from adopting."

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: On supporting Mitch McConnell as U.S. Senate majority leader.

author: Miriam Valverde
statement: "There are billboards in Central America in the Northern Triangle countries advertising how to grab a kid to get into the United States illegally."

author: Sarah Anne
statement: "[The] unemployment rate in the Philadelphia metro area is now at its lowest level ever recorded."

author: John Kruzel
statement: Says the Steele dossier "was responsible for starting" Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s investigation into links between the Trump campaign and Russia.

author: Taylor Palmby
statement: Wisconsin lost "almost 4,000 manufacturing jobs in 2017."

author: W. Gardner
statement: Says a poll showed Democrat Beto O’Rourke within 2 percentage points of Republican Sen. Ted Cruz.

author: Erasmo Passaro
statement: "NASA prepping 17-year-old Alyssa Carson to become first human on Mars."

author: Amy Sherman
statement: "Lisa Page squeals: DNC server was not hacked by Russians."

author: Amy Sherman
statement: On maintaining Medicaid expansion in Ohio as part of the Affordable Care Act

author: Diana Dombrowski
statement: Tammy Baldwin "opposed displaying the flag and reciting the Pledge of Allegiance or singing the National Anthem in our classrooms."
